title: Cursive unknown
content:
Hello!

Can you ID this nice cursive font found?

Merci!!
author: Shawali

comments.content: Well for some reason, the upload image button isn't there and the insert image link doesn't work...
Upload the image to an image hoster (like [http://imageshack.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820001418/http:/imageshack.com/ "http://imageshack.com")) and post the URL here …
